[SYNTAX]: Occasionally complex, archaic sentence structures (e.g., "the shadowy times when heroic figures march...") may slightly impede readability for modern audiences.

[TRANSITION]: Abrupt shift from poetic prologue ("Nacogdoches Speaks") to historical narrative without explicit contextual linkage.

[LEXICON]: Archaisms (e.g., "grew apace") and minor phrasing awkwardness.

[TRANSITION]: Abrupt shifts between paragraphs (e.g., from Ybarbo’s removal to Nolan’s expedition).
[STRUCTURE]: Dense, unconnected historical events (e.g., Louisiana purchase introduction lacks clear integration).
